评论概述: Looked nice, but did not last one day's wear
评论详情: The vest looked very nice and fit my partner very well. It was perfect in looks and cut. However, only a few hours of him wearing it passed, and one side of the cinch strap on the back unraveled and came detached from the vest. This resulted in tearing of the other side, since both straps were hanging from a single side, connected by the buckle. The look of the vest is good; the quality of its construction leaves something to be desired.

评论概述: great way to upscale a suit
评论详情: this vest is well made the material is quality and the back material gives it an upscale look . the buckel in the back straps is solid .I'm short but the size fit perfectly and the color match was perfect for my suit .It comes with a faux pocket square sewen in the top pocket I wish wasn't there but it looks ok.The lower pockets had some stiches in the cutting them in half but came out easily .I will definitely be ordering more in different colors

This vest is a slim fit. I've seen reviews telling you to get a size bigger, don't unless you're a  big guy. Just understand that slim fit is exactly that. I wanted a tailored, well fitted vest and that's just what this is. Regarding the fabric, it's nice, a good weight to it, and the craftsmanship is good.  The styling is also very good and works as casual or formal. I have another black vest that feels kind of fragile compared to this. This feels good to wear. At this price you would be had pressed to find a better deal. This is my new "Go to" vest, I'm very happy with it.
My husband is a bigger guy, so the reviews stating larger arm holes was a plus for us.  Fit is just great!!

评论概述: Would Give ZERO stars if an option

Top it off with a loose thread and it is completely worthless.

Looks great and is very comfortable. I will say one of the straps in the back that are used to fit it/tighten it easily tore right out of its seam. I can sew though and just pinned it temporarily for these photos so it isn't a problem for me personally.

I would have to say all in all great quality. As a performer it's a nice addition to my costuming. I would have to say the back clasp could be a bit more sturdy. It releases over time and especially with active movement like choreography.  If you are not doing that then you should be golden. That's my only concern. Other than that it's a solid buy.

评论详情: I do like how it fits, even tho I call it my corset vest. I like that it goes down lower than my last one, and I really like that. I also love how deep the pockets are. The breast pocket is deep enough to hold my business cards. All around, pretty darn nice for the price.

Wore it twice, wasn’t super tight or anything on me. Never washed but ran it through the dryer once for about 10 mins, wore it a second time and the threading came off two buttons. Poorly made product, would not but from seller again. It’s cheap.

It seemed like a correct fit but if you have a bit of a belly like I do, you're gonna want to UP a size. I'm sending this Large back and ordering an XL. I'm 5'10 200lbs for reference. Sorry no photo. 4 stars for price and look. I'll review again when I get the XL. *UPDATE : The XL came and fits great! I was worried the shoulder area would too much difference but it was just right and, I can button up without feeling too snug. One size up made a huge difference and I'm excited to wear it to my friend's wedding.

This looks okay, color is good and it’s probably not hot being a little thin. The pocket is sewn in with a white hanky. I ordered a size larger than I normally wear going off their size chart and It’s still a little tight.

I ordered this vest in 3XL based on the sizing chart.  I have worn 3XL for years but have lost nearly 70lbs over the last year so you think I could downsize.  When I tried on the clearly labeled 3XL vest I couldn’t even draw it over my stomach by at least 6”.  I have seen this before where items from Asia are not sized like in the US.  I have no idea about the quality of the vest as I couldn’t even wear it.  I have other 3XL vests that not only fit but are very loose due to my weight loss.  Simply put, don’t trust the sizing, purchase at hour own risk
